titles.title: Indian Integrated Resources Management Planning Act
Indian Integrated Resources Management Planning Act of 1994
A bill to provide for the integrated management of Indian resources, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3072-3074)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.
Committee on Indian Affairs. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-895.

calendar.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

action.text: Committee on Indian Affairs. Reported to Senate by Senator Inouye with an amendment in the nature of a substitute. With written report No. 103-316.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 524.

bill.summary: 7/18/1994--Reported to Senate amended. Indian Integrated Resources Management Planning Act of 1994 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish a program to assist Indian tribes to develop and implement integrated natural resource management plans. Authorizes appropriations.
